name: Sush Mobile
tagline: Digital Development in Auckland, New Zealand
description:
Sush Mobile, your digital development specialist for iPhone, iPad, Android, Tablet & Web devices.
At Sush Mobile, we are well versed in creating beautiful, native mobile apps, but it doesn't stop there. Our mission is to provide complete, end-to-end development solutions, working with New Zealand organisations to guide them towards achieving their digital goals.
